title: Cite ungoogled-chromium project
description: Reference: https://ungoogled-software.github.io/ungoogled-chromium-wiki/faq - Credit the browser project used in this lab

title: Integrate Chrome DevTools MCP for enhanced automation
description:
Add Chrome DevTools Protocol MCP server to enable:
- Direct DOM manipulation (faster than sequential clicks)
- Network interception and monitoring  
- Console access for debugging
- Performance profiling

This could help solve the CAPTCHA timeout issue by:
1. Batch-clicking multiple tiles in parallel
2. Direct element interaction without UI delays
3. Better visibility into what's happening

The challenge expired because sequential clicking of 12 tiles took too long.

Resources:
- Chrome DevTools Protocol docs
- Playwright CDP session: page.context().newCDPSession()

title: Build warm browser profile
description: Create human-like browsing history and cookies
close_reason: Demonstrated warm profile benefit: Warm session = direct pass (no challenge), Fresh session = image challenge required. Warm profiles reduce CAPTCHA friction.

title: Integrate Claude Code Hooks with CAPTCHA Lab
description:
Map CAPTCHA lab patterns to Claude Code hooks system:

## Connection Map
| CAPTCHA Lab Component | Claude Code Hooks Equivalent |
|----------------------|------------------------------|
| 'Land Ho\!' detection | PostToolUse hook checking navigation results |
| Worker pause on CAPTCHA | Exit Code 2 - block stopping, force continuation |
| Observer + Worker pattern | SubagentStop + Task tool coordination |
| Stealth retry loop | Ralph Wiggum persistent loop pattern |

## Implementation Goals
1. PreToolUse hook: Validate stealth config before browser actions
2. PostToolUse hook: Check for CAPTCHA after navigation
3. Stop hook: Force continuation if CAPTCHA detected (Exit Code 2)
4. Ralph Wiggum loop: Autonomous stealth testing iterations

## Resources
- Ralph Wiggum plugin for persistent loops
- 8 lifecycle events: UserPromptSubmit, PreToolUse, PostToolUse, Stop, SubagentStop, PreCompact, SessionStart, Notification

## Producer Mindset Alignment
Teaching families to BUILD autonomous tooling, not just consume AI outputs.
close_reason: Claude Code Hooks integration complete and tested. All hooks working: PreToolUse (stealth validation), PostToolUse (CAPTCHA detection), Stop (Ralph Wiggum loop). Successfully passed reCAPTCHA challenges.

title: Create PreToolUse hook for stealth validation
description: Before browser navigation, validate stealth config is active. Block if fingerprint leaking.
close_reason: Created pre-navigate.sh hook for stealth validation

title: Run full demo
